wordlist.name: Aaron
wordlist.shortdesc: The brother Moses and Miriam; the first 'Kohen Gadol' of High Priest of Israel.

wordlist.name: ABBA
wordlist.shortdesc: Aramaic. n Abba. 'Daddy', 'dear Father', 'papa'; a term of endearment for one's father.

wordlist.name: Adam
wordlist.shortdesc: Means human being or person; related to words 'red' and 'earth'.

wordlist.name: Darkness
wordlist.shortdesc: Means the opposite of light; the absence of light.

wordlist.name: Day
wordlist.shortdesc: The interval of light between two successive nights.

wordlist.name: Eden
wordlist.shortdesc: Biblical Garden God planted for man as described in book of Genesis.

wordlist.name: Evening
wordlist.shortdesc: The period from sunset to bedtime.
